channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0280; 06:55AM; 4922 S Sycamore Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/48emZ0n; DelRey; LAFD (with assistance from Culver City FD) battled flames in a fully-engulfed one-story single family home that appeared to be vacant. It took 37 LAFD firefighters 41 minutes to extinguish the flames, holding the fire to the unit-of-origin. After eliminating the blaze, two patients were found inside. One was transported in unknown condition, and sadly, another was deceased. PIO Captain Adam Van Gerpen is en route for media needs. ETA approximately 7:30am.; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; AR1 BC4 BC9 CM40 CM42 E205 E292 E43 E462 E5 EM18 PI2 RA43 RA62 RA862 T5 T92; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0280; 06:14AM; 4918 S Sycamore Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/48emZ0n; #DelRey; Vacant one-story home with heavy fire showing. Offensive mode. ; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 BC9 E205 E292 E43 E462 E5 RA62 RA862 T5 T92; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#1559; 08:44PM; Jeffrey Mark Ct; MAP: https://bit.ly/42B7HBy; #Chatsworth; An adult male was stranded in a remote area west of Chatsworth Park South, where bystanders heard cries for help. LAFD responded by ground and air to assist. Rescuers made contact with the man, who had minor injures, and hoisted him from the remote location, and making a "short haul" to a nearby helispot (predetermined helicopter landing area), where he was transferred to an LAFD ambulance for paramedic assessment and transport to a local hospital for further evaluation. Nothing further.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC15 E106 E107 E296 H0B H4 H7 HA4 HA7 RA107 RH114 T96; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0797; 12:58PM; 11937 S Hoover St; MAP: https://bit.ly/49QnZcv; #VermontVista; Firefighters responded to a one-story row of bungalows with fire in the common attic, but just over one unit. Crews quickly extended hose lines into the structure to apply water to the seat of the fire, and ascended ladders to the roof for vertical ventilation, allowing the smoke and heated gases to escape. Ultimately, it took 31 firefighters 25 minutes to extinguish the flames. Crews confined the flames to only the unit of origin, and prevented any damage to the adjoining units. No reported (human) injuries, as no one was home at the time of the fire. Sadly, one canine was found deceased inside. Cause under investigation.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC11 BC13 BC18 CM20 CM22 E221 E233 E264 E46 E57 E64 E65 E66 E79 EM13 RA57 RA864 T21 T33 T64; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0797; 12:33PM; 11937 S Hoover St; MAP: https://bit.ly/49QnZcv; #VermontVista; One-story row of bungalows with smoke showing from the common attic. Offensive mode.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC11 BC13 BC18 CM20 CM22 E221 E233 E264 E46 E57 E65 E66 E79 EM13 RA57 RA864 T21 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0558; 10:11AM; Paseo Miramar Trail; MAP: https://bit.ly/49c8tYb; #PacificPalisades; LAFD ground and air response to an adult male hiker who sustained minor injuries in a ground-level fall on a remote section of the Paseo Miramar Trail in the Santa Monica Mountains. Rough fire road conditions due to recent storms prevent a quick or safe ground transport. The patient, in fair condition, is being hoisted into a hovering LAFD Rescue Helicopter, where he will receive in-flight care during direct transport to a regional hospital. ; FS 23; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E23 E269 H4 H6 HA4 HA6 RA23 RH114 T69; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Cliff Rescue; INC#0440; 09:03AM; 4040 S Bluff Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/49tx8Ye; #SanPedro; PRELIM: LAFD land, air and sea response to an adult male (landscaper who slipped but did not fall?), who is stranded but physically stable on a seaside cliff approximately 75 feet from the cliff top, and twenty feet above sea level. He does not appear to be injured. LAFD divers swam from their fireboat to assist at the shoreline, as LAFD Rescue Helicopters now hover above. Because of high tide and cold seas, the man will soon be hoisted aboard the helicopter. He will be transferred the care of LAFD ground crews at a bluff top landing zone.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; AO1 AO2 BC6 BT1 BT17 BT2 E101 E205 E248 E3 E48 EM13 H1 H4 HA1 HA4 RA101 RA36 RH114 T48 T5 UR5 UR88; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire Civilian Fatality 02/10/2024 INC#0066

item.description: Update Civilian Fatality Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0066; 03:45AM; 832 E Manchester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wcMwKa; #GreenMeadows; As firefighters continue their search through the still smoldering debris of the 50' x 100' one-story building that was heavily involved with fire on their arrival, they have discovered the remains of one adult male civilian inside the severely damaged structure. Their systematic search will continue, to assure no other victims were inside the seemingly abandoned building that proved to contain a cannabis operation. The Mayor's Crisis Response Team has been summoned to the scene, and LAFD Public Information Officer Captain Adam VanGerpen remains on site to assist the media. The fire's cause is under active investigation.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC4 CM20 CM22 E203 E21 E215 E221 E233 E264 E266 E3 E33 E46 E57 E64 E65 E95 EA1 EM11 EM13 HR3 JT3 PI2 RA3 RA33 RA803 RA833 SO1 SQ21 SQ95 T15 T21 T3 T33 T64 T66 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - Major Emergency Structure Fire 02/10/2024 INC#0066

item.description: Knockdown - Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0066; 02:32AM; 832 E Manchester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wcMwKa; #GreenMeadows; 113 LAFD Firefighters took 75 minutes in largely defensive operations to extinguish heavy fire within a well involved 50' x 100' seemingly vacant commercial building that proved to contain a cannabis operation. No injury. Fire cause under active investigation. LAFD Public Information Officer Captain Adam VanGerpen is en route to the scene. ETA 3:00 AM.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC4 CM20 CM22 EA1 E203 E21 E215 E221 E233 E264 E266 E3 E33 E46 E57 E64 E65 E95 EM11 EM13 HR3 PI2 RA3 RA33 RA803 RA833 SQ21 SQ95 T15 T21 T3 T33 T64 T66 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0066; 01:17AM; 832 E Manchester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wcMwKa; #GreenMeadows; PRELIM: Defensive firefighting operations on a well involved 50' x 100' abandoned commercial building. ; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC4 CM20 CM22 E203 E21 E215 E221 E233 E264 E266 E3 E33 E46 E57 E64 E65 E95 EM11 EM13 HR3 RA33 RA803 RA833 SQ21 SQ95 T15 T21 T3 T33 T64 T66 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Brian Humphrey
